backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing access control, user profiles, categories, and document storage with authorization checks and migration mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining legacy types and returning the previous actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining theme tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React router setup with AuthGate and role‑protected routes for dashboard, documents, upload, details, and settings.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate that initializes Internet Identity and displays a login screen until authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/Permissions: UI screen shown when permission checks fail or time out, with retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Route guard that fetches caller roles, handles timeouts and errors, and enforces admin or user permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/Unauthorize: Displays an unauthorized access message with an optional button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/documents/Docume: Provides actions for a document including view, download, and delete with confirmation dialogs.
Renders filtering controls for documents such as search, category, office, direction, and date range.
Displays a selectable table of documents with metadata and navigation to document details.
frontend/src/components/documents/EmptyS: Shows an empty state illustration with a prompt to upload the first document.
Defines the main application layout with navigation, theme toggle, user menu, and header branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav: Implements a mobile-friendly dropdown navigation menu with admin-only options.
frontend/src/features/auth/useCallerRole: Fetches and exposes the current user's role with loading, retry, and error handling.
frontend/src/features/categories/useCate: Fetches the list of categories from the backend once an actor is available.
Provides React Query mutations for adding, updating, and removing categories and offices, invalidating category queries and showing toast messages.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/useDashb: Fetches and computes dashboard metrics by filtering documents client‑side until backend metrics are available.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDelet: Defines a mutation to delete a document and invalidates related queries after removal.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDocum: Loads a single document by ID using React Query and the backend actor.
Fetches filtered documents, applies text search and sorting client‑side, and supports incremental loading.
frontend/src/features/documents/useUploa: Handles uploading a document by encoding the file, sending metadata to the backend, tracking progress, and invalidating queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login handling, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind styles, CSS variables for themes, and utility classes including line clamping and popover background rules.
frontend/src/lib/categoryHelpers.ts: Provides helpers for rendering category labels and converting categories into select options.
frontend/src/lib/exportDocuments.ts: Converts document data into CSV format and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/lib/officeHelpers.ts: Provides helpers to list office options and resolve office names from a category.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays dashboard metrics and category navigation, handling loading and error states. Shows totals, direction counts, and category cards linking to documents.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentDetailPage.ts: Shows detailed information and preview for a single document, with actions, metadata, and navigation. Handles loading, errors, and direction/category formatting.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentListPage.tsx: Lists documents with filters, infinite loading, selection, and CSV export. Manages filter state, syncing with route params, and selection logic.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI for managing categories and offices, including add, edit, and delete dialogs. Uses mutations and form state to update configuration.
frontend/src/pages/UploadDocumentPage.ts: Handles uploading a new document with form inputs, validation, progress, and success state. Supports category/office selection and direction input.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for getting URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL hashes for routing and token handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current architecture notes, issues, and feature requests related to fixing login permission checks and role resolution.
